responses: Hi there, how can I help?
I'm Dibby, your friendly printing assistant!

patterns: do you know how to code
responses: I can help you work through any printer errors you're experiencing!

patterns: I need assistance with general matters.
On the lookout for general assistance.
Hunting for help with general issues.
In need of assistance with general concerns.
responses: I can assist with that! Could you explain your question?

patterns: I need help with a specific issue
Can you assist me with a particular problem?
I could use some help on a specific matter
I'm struggling with a certain issue
I've got a particular issue that I need assistance with
Mind giving me a hand with a particular issue that's bothering me?
responses: I can help with that! What's going wrong with your print? If you're in a rush, I can also guide you to a different printer.

patterns: Take me to a different printer
I want to go to a different printer
Is there a working printer I can go to?
Is there a different printer option?
Can you send me to a different printer?
Lead me to a new printer
responses: Of course! Dibner's IT help desk on the the third floor of 5 MetroTech is open from 10-8. They can help with troubleshooting. Otherwise, printer X has no reported issues- I suggest printing there instead!

patterns: How do I know what printer I'm currently using?
Can you tell me which printer I'm using?
Do you know what printer I'm working with?
What's the printer I'm currently working with?
Any idea which printer I'm using at the moment?
Where do I see the printer I'm currently using?
Help figure out what printer I'm using
responses: All printers have a big piece of paper on the front with a letter on it- this letter is the name of the printer you're using!

patterns: How do I know what printer prints in color?
Can you tell me which printer will print in color
Where can I find the color printer?
Any idea which printer prints in color?
Where do I find the color printer?
Do all printers print in color?
responses: Dibner has one color printer, labeled E! Turn left when you enter the main area of the 3rd floor of Dibner to find it!

patterns: Printer says I have zero balance but I know I have money
Claiming zero balance but I have money
Declaring zero balance - I have money
Printer says I have 0 balance but my account has money
Display shows zero balance, my account is loaded
Screens telling me I have no money but I do
I have money but printer says I don't
My account has money but display says it doesn't
responses: I'm so sorry the printer display is stating you have a 0 balance even though you have money on your account! Please reupload your document to NYU Mobile Print and try printing again- this should fix the issue.
